ai.summary: A short, easy 0.8 km loop starting and ending at Banstead Station in Surrey, UK. This beginner-friendly stroll blends parkland and light woodland for a quick outdoor break or a family-friendly outing.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, with a mix of paved paths and compact gravel. Gentle gradients through parkland and Banstead Woods, with some street crossings near the station. Shade along tree-lined sections.
ai.safety_notes: Be mindful of cyclists on shared paths; watch uneven pavements around park edges; stay on marked routes; supervise children and pets; check weather conditions before you go; carry water and a mobile phone.
ai.best_seasons: Year-round; spring and autumn offer pleasant weather and lighter crowds
